author: Simon Difford
description: Gin and cognac sit surprisingly well together as base ingredients with gentian and citrus freshness.
name: Keyser Söze cocktail
recipeIngredient: 22.5 ml Gentian liqueur (e.g. Suze, Salers etc)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
